title: Bike Club NFT is the first Blockchain-based cycling club to be minting real-world benefits
content:
The first rule about Bike Club NFT is… wait, what’s an NFT? If you’ve managed to steer clear of all the recent talk of NFTs, the simple answer is that it’s a one-of-a-kind digital item that only one person can own. These NFTs, or Non-Fungible Tokens, are popping up as everything from cartoon apes to

The post Bike Club NFT is the first Blockchain-based cycling club to be minting real-world benefits appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
